name: Rekroot
description: At rekroot, we're your dedicated recruiting partner specializing in financial services. Whether through consulting and coaching or delivering top-tier candidates, we ensure your hiring needs are met with precision. We understand that securing and retaining top talent is crucial for business success. With our expert support and thorough research, we enable you to make confident hiring decisions that drive your organization's growth trajectory.

enhanced_description: Rekroot, launched in 2015 and headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, is a dedicated recruiting partner specializing in the financial services sector. They provide expert support and thorough research to help organizations secure and retain top talent, enabling confident hiring decisions that drive growth. Their core offerings include comprehensive consulting and coaching, assistance in hiring and developing internal recruiters, and speaking engagements. Rekroot operates on principles of intention, integrity, and influence, offering unique insights and tools tailored for today's dynamic recruitment landscape. They aim to be a strategic partner for both small and global enterprises, focusing on helping clients hire top talent faster and more efficiently, and significantly boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
